inner_peace.buddha: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
inner_peace.gita: One who is not disturbed by joy or sorrow is steady in mind.
inner_peace.jesus: My peace I give you. Do not let your hearts be troubled.
inner_peace.quran: Truly, it is in the remembrance of God that hearts find peace.

forgiveness.buddha: Holding onto anger is like drinking poison and expecting the other person to die.
forgiveness.jesus: Forgive them, for they know not what they do.
forgiveness.gita: A wise person does not hate nor desire — he forgives and finds peace.

gratitude.bible: Give thanks in all circumstances; for this is God’s will for you.
gratitude.veda: Let us be grateful for the food, the hands that prepared it, and the divine source.
gratitude.quran: If you are grateful, I will surely increase you in favor.

fear.gita: The soul is neither born nor does it die. Fear not what is eternal.
fear.jesus: Do not be afraid, for I am with you always.
fear.quran: Fear not, for indeed I am with you, hearing and seeing.

compassion.buddha: Radiate boundless love toward the entire world.
compassion.gita: One who has no enemies among all beings is dear to Me.

letting_go.buddha: You only lose what you cling to.
letting_go.gita: Renounce attachment to the results of your actions.
letting_go.bible: Cast your burdens upon the Lord and He will sustain you.

suffering.buddha: Pain is certain, suffering is optional.
suffering.gita: The wise grieve neither for the living nor the dead.

purpose.gita: It is better to live your own destiny imperfectly than to live another’s perfectly.
purpose.quran: And I did not create mankind except to worship Me.
purpose.bible: You are the light of the world. Let your light shine.

ego.gita: Those free from pride and ego, who remain unattached—attain peace.
ego.buddha: Conquer the angry one with love. The ego with generosity.
ego.bible: Whoever humbles himself will be exalted.

truth.jesus: The truth will set you free.
truth.quran: And say: The truth has come, and falsehood has vanished.

love.bible: Love is patient, love is kind. It always protects, always trusts.
love.gita: He who sees all beings in the Self and the Self in all beings—such a person is full of love.
love.buddha: Hatred does not cease by hatred, but only by love.

service.gita: By selfless service, one attains the highest goal.
service.jesus: Whoever wants to be great must be your servant.
service.quran: The best among you are those who are most beneficial to others.

mindfulness.buddha: Do not dwell in the past; do not dream of the future; concentrate the mind on the present moment.
mindfulness.yoga_sutra: Yoga is the stilling of the fluctuations of the mind.
mindfulness.bible: Be still, and know that I am God.

divine_presence.bible: Even though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil.
divine_presence.gita: I am the Self seated in the hearts of all beings.
divine_presence.quran: We are closer to you than your jugular vein.

self_discovery.gita: One must elevate oneself by one’s own mind, not degrade oneself.
self_discovery.buddha: No one saves us but ourselves. We ourselves must walk the path.
self_discovery.upanishads: You are that which you seek.

faith.bible: Faith is the substance of things hoped for, the evidence of things not seen.
faith.gita: A person is what his faith is. Whatever is one’s faith, that he becomes.
faith.quran: Indeed, Allah is with those who have faith.

humility.bible: God opposes the proud but gives grace to the humble.
humility.buddha: To conquer oneself is a greater victory than to conquer thousands in a battle.
humility.gita: Humility, nonviolence, patience and honesty are the qualities of the wise.

acceptance.gita: Be steadfast in yoga, O Arjuna. Perform your duty and abandon all attachment to success or failure.
acceptance.buddha: Accept what is, let go of what was, and have faith in what will be.
acceptance.quran: Perhaps you hate a thing and it is good for you.

trust.bible: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.
trust.quran: And whoever puts their trust in Allah – then He will be sufficient for them.
trust.upanishads: The Self cannot be known through study, only through trust and surrender.

healing.jesus: By His wounds, we are healed.
healing.buddha: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth.
healing.ayurveda: When diet is wrong, medicine is of no use. When diet is correct, medicine is of no need.

non_attachment.gita: One who performs their duty without attachment is truly spiritual.
non_attachment.buddha: Attachment is the root of suffering.
non_attachment.tao: The master has no possessions. The more he does for others, the happier he is.

simplicity.jesus: Blessed are the pure in heart, for they shall see God.
simplicity.tao_te_ching: Manifest plainness, embrace simplicity, reduce selfishness, have few desires.
simplicity.gita: A person is dear to Me who is content, simple, and peaceful.

oneness.upanishads: There is no multiplicity in the Self. It is One without a second.
oneness.gita: I am the source of all spiritual and material worlds.
oneness.quran: He is One, eternal, absolute. He begets not, nor is He begotten.

presence.buddha: The secret of health for both mind and body is not to mourn the past or worry about the future.
presence.jesus: Do not worry about tomorrow, for tomorrow will worry about itself.
presence.zen: When walking, walk. When eating, eat.

balance.buddha: Take the middle path — not too tight, not too loose.
balance.tao: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.

joy.gita: Happiness comes not by desire’s fulfillment but by desire’s renunciation.
joy.bible: The joy of the Lord is your strength.
joy.buddha: Happiness never decreases by being shared.

intention.buddha: What you think, you become. What you feel, you attract. What you imagine, you create.
intention.gita: Man is made by his belief. As he believes, so he is.
intention.quran: Every deed is judged by the intention behind it.

inner_light.bible: Let your light shine before others.
inner_light.upanishads: The Self is the light of all lights, shining within the heart.
inner_light.gita: That light which shines beyond all darkness is the divine Self.

silence.buddha: Silence is the language of the wise.
silence.gita: He is a yogi who is content in silence, in solitude, and in his own Self.
silence.tao: Silence is a source of great strength.

death.gita: As a man discards old clothes and puts on new, so the soul discards the body and takes a new one.
death.bible: To be absent from the body is to be present with the Lord.
death.buddha: Every mortal thing comes to an end; only the truth remains.
